A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie destroys everything we knew and loved about the original star wars trilogy\, from its pointless sub-plots to its stupid plot-twists; this movie is terrible. The thing I hated most about this movie is what they've done to Luke Skywalker\, they've turned his character from the last hope into the last nope! The only reason I haven't given this movie the lowest rating is because to be fair the visuals were stunning. But apart from that it's terrible.
